Package ohos.global.i18n.phonenumbers

Class InputFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.i18n.phonenumbers.InputFormatter

  • public abstract class InputFormatter
extends Object
    Formats the string representation of a phone number.
    Since:
    4

      • inputNumber

        public abstract String inputNumber​(char nextChar)
        Inputs the next character to obtain the formatting results of all previously input characters.
        Parameters:
        nextChar - Indicates the next character to input.
        Returns:
        Returns the formatting results of all the previously input characters.
        Since:
        4

      • getPosition

        public abstract int getPosition​()
        Obtains the position where the character was inserted in the last invocation of inputNumberAndRememberPosition(char).
        Returns:

        Since:
        4
        See Also:

      • clean

        public abstract void clean​()
        Clears the InputFormatter object.
        Since:
        4

      • inputNumberAndRememberPosition

        public abstract String inputNumberAndRememberPosition​(char nextChar)
        Inputs the next character to obtain the formatting results of all previously input characters, and records the position where nextChar is inserted. The recorded position can be obtained by getPosition().
        Parameters:
        nextChar - Indicates the next character to input.
        Returns:
        Returns the formatting results of all the previously input characters.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        getPosition()

      • getInstance

        public static InputFormatter getInstance​(String regionCode)
        Obtains an InputFormatter instance associated with the specified regionCode.
        Parameters:
        regionCode - Indicates the region to which the InputFormatter instance belongs.
        Returns:
        Returns the InputFormatter instance associated with the specified regionCode.
        Since:
        4
